alert.note: Alert for Santa Catalina and Rincon Mountains including Mount Lemmon, Summerhaven; Tucson Metro Area including Tucson, Green Valley, Marana, Vail (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 4:14PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Pima County through 500 PM MST... At 414 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Catalina Foothills, or near Oro Valley, moving west at 15 mph. Additionally, another strong thunderstorm was located near Picture Rocks. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tucson, Catalina, Oro Valley, Marana, Davis-Monthan Air Force Base, Casas Adobes, Flowing Wells, South Tucson, Avra Valley, Tortolita, Catalina State Park, Saguaro National Park West, Catalina Foothills, Picture Rocks and Dove Mountain. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 between mile markers 234 and 259. Route 77 between mile markers 70 and 86. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Santa Catalina and Rincon Mountains including Mount Lemmon, Summerhaven; Tucson Metro Area including Tucson, Green Valley, Marana, Vail
